definition: وكس wakaaa يكس yakisu (waks) to decline in value, depreciate; to decrease, diminish, reduce, lower (هـ the value or price of); pass. wukisa to suffer losses (in business) II to decrease, diminish, reduce, lower (هـ the value of) وكس waks decline, drop (of value or price); depreciation; loss │ باغ بالوكوس to sell at a loss
